title: Respond to a Trademark Office Action
description: The USPTO has issued an Office Action refusing a trademark application. An IP attorney needs to draft a response.

tasks.description: Review the Office Action to understand the legal basis for the refusal (e.g., 'likelihood of confusion' with a prior mark).
Research case law and prepare legal arguments to overcome the refusal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds legal support for why the marks are not confusingly similar.

tasks.description: Draft a formal response to the Office Action, presenting the legal arguments and any supporting evidence.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a persuasive response to send to the USPTO.
